meanings.definition: Third person singular present of come.
meanings.sent1: The train cometh to the station every morning.
meanings.sent2: The sun cometh up in the east every day.
meanings.sent3: The cat cometh running when it hears the food bowl.
meanings.sent4: Hope cometh like a ray of light in the darkest hour.
meanings.sent5: The storm cometh with a roar, shaking the windows.

meanings.sent1: The rain cometh down from the sky.
meanings.sent2: Night cometh quickly in the winter months.
meanings.sent3: Laughter cometh easily when friends gather.
meanings.sent4: Success cometh to those who work hard and persevere.
meanings.sent5: Spring cometh with a burst of color and fragrance.
